resources.string: There are some abbreviations used in this app, shown as follows: HCONRES - House Concurrent Resolution HJRES - House Joint Resolution HR - House Bill HRES - House Simple Resolution S - Senate Bill SCONRES - Senate Concurrent Resolution SJRES - Senate Joint Resolution SRES - Senate Simple Resolution
Voting is an important part of democracy. Learn the basics of voter registration at https://www.usa.gov/register-to-vote and specifics of registering to vote in each state at https://vote.gov/
